content: This article gives a great analysis of food tech. As a subscriber of Stratechery, I appreciate the depth of thinking Ben possesses. His theory is sort of rule of thumb for digital/gig economy. Zomato vs Swiggy is a great example, which reminds me of the food tech business in general. Food tech and grocery and by far biggest industry which are very difficult to crack and many have failed to do. The ken has a great illustrated guide to Food tech and why it is difficult to crack. It’s a great read. https://the-ken.com/illustrated-guide-indian-food-tech-part-1/ https://the-ken.com/illustrated-guide-indian-food-tech-part-2/
